history.narrative: Law 9-130, the “Newsprint Recycling Amendment Act of 1992,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 9-291, which was referred to the Committee on Public Works. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on April 7, 1992, and May 6, 1992, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on May 28, 1992, it was assigned Act No. 9-215 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 9-130 became effective on July 22, 1992.
